title: Brain Specialists - MultiBrain Integration
description: Implement MultiBrain specialist integration for distributed cognitive processing across brain layers

tasks.title: Create MultiBrain base class
tasks.description: Create MultiBrain base class for specialist integration. Should provide: specialist registration, cross-brain communication, distributed processing coordination, brain-specific telemetry.
acceptance_criteria: Supports multiple specialist types (symbolic, neural, quantum, bio)
No F821 errors on MultiBrain variable

tasks.title: Implement specialist routing
tasks.description: Create routing logic to direct cognitive tasks to appropriate specialists. Use task type, complexity, and context to select specialist (symbolic for reasoning, neural for pattern recognition, quantum for optimization, bio for adaptation).
acceptance_criteria: Routing considers: task type, complexity, context, specialist load

notes: MultiBrain enables distributed cognitive processing across specialized subsystems. Each specialist handles different cognitive modalities (symbolic reasoning, neural pattern recognition, quantum optimization, bio adaptation).
